Rantjs

Procedurally generated text with JavaScript

  View Project Source   Spread the Word

Make a sentence

Supported tags

Here's a list of currently supported tags

[sep:\s|\n]
My favorite colors: [rep:2]{<color>}
[case:none|default|word|upper|lower|case|sentence]

Supported tokens

Here's a list of currently supported tokens


  <preposition>
  <firstname>
  <activity>
  <adj>
  <adv>
  <amount>
  <color>
  <conj>
  <country>
  <emo>
  <em>
  <face>
  <greet>
  <surname>
  <noun>
  <sound>
  <title>
  <place>
  <prefix>
  <prepos>
  <pron>
  <quality>
  <rel>
  <sconj>
  <substance>
  <timeadv>
  <timenoun>
  <unit>
  <verbimg>
  <say>
  <verb>
  <vocal>
  <yn>

  Additionally, many of the tokens can have subgroups, such as:
  <activity video>
  <activity game>
  <activity board>
  <adj weather>
  <adj emotion>
  <adj nationality>
  <adj appearance>
  <adv emotion>
  <adv sexy>
  <color secondary>
  <color primary>
  <country mediterranean>
  <country caribbean>
  <country oceania>
  <country eurasia>
  <country africa>
  <country middleeast>
  <country southamerica>
  <country asia>
  <country europe>
  <country northamerica>
  <country centralamerica>
  <firstname male>
  <firstname female>
  <noun surface>
  <noun furniture>
  <noun round>
  <noun body>
  <noun liquid>
  <noun insect>
  <noun clothes>
  <noun plant>
  <noun person>
  <noun tool>
  <noun long>
  <noun ball>
  <noun article>
  <noun drug>
  <noun fruit>
  <noun container>
  <noun instrument>
  <noun sex>
  <noun job>
  <noun weapon>
  <noun hole>
  <noun food>
  <noun vehicle>
  <noun animal>
  <noun shape>
  and many more

  Tags such as <noun>, <adv>, 
  <place> (and more) can have a 
  <em>plural</em> attribute
  <noun plural>, <adv plural>, 
  <place plural>

  Verbs has: transitive, walk, intransitive, 
  sex, pose, eat, liquid, motion, insert, 
  violent, political, legal, move
  and can be: simple, ing, ed, s, er, pp, noun

  So...: 
  <verb ing> 
  <verb ed> 
  <verb s> 
  <verb er> 
  <verb violent er>
  etc...

Rantjs

Rantjs is a procedural text generator. The goal is to augment human creativity with the boundless potential of randomness.

Examples

  • <firstname male> likes to <verb nsfw> <noun nsfw> with <pron poss male> pet <noun-animal>.
  • - I <verb emotion> <noun animal plural>, said <firstname>. - Why? asked <firstname>. - They are so <adj emotion ing>.
  • [case:word]<yn yes> <yn no>
  • <firstname male> likes to <verb-transitive> <noun.plural> with <pron poss male> pet <noun-animal> on <timenoun dayofweek plural>.
  • A random string: [rep:8][sep:\N]{\C}
  • I need <amount> <adj> <noun.plural> filled with <adj> <noun plural>.
  • The <adj> <noun> <adv> <verb.ed> the <adj> <noun> whilst <adv> being <verb ed>.
  • <title>, help!
  • The <adj emotion> doctor <verb walk ed> the cat
  • I like my <noun-shape>-shaped <noun-body.plural>

The project is based on Rant. This implementation is made to be included in JavaScript projects.

Rantjs is created and maintained by Sven A Robbestad
